effect.en: The number of Benched Pokémon your opponent can have is now 4. If your opponent has 5 Benched Pokémon, your opponent must discard 1 of them and all cards attached to it.
effect.fr: Le nombre de Pokémon de Banc de votre adversaire est maintenant limité à 4. Si votre adversaire a 5 Pokémon de Banc, il doit défausser l’un d’entre eux et toutes les cartes qui lui sont attachées.

description.en: Its transformation ability is perfect. However, if made to laugh, it can’t maintain its disguise.
